item.description:
Hello Meditators, the Boston Meditation Group is officially back on Meetup again.

I'd like to get together with you all to say hello and to come up with mutually convenient time / location for weekly sits.

We'll be meeting at the Paris Creperie, which is a 3 minute walk from the Charles/MGH T stop (red line). When you exit the t station, walk to the CVS, go under the T overpass, and look for the Paris Creperie on your RH side.

Look forward to meeting you on Sunday, June 25th @ 7 pm. -ECD
item.name: Boston Meditation Group - June Meetup
